title: AdminTools
description: An SCP:SL EXILED plugin that gives server owners fun commands and logging functionality for their servers

title: SerpentsHand
description: EXILED [SCP:SL] Plugin that adds a new CH to the game [SCP/SH]

title: ScpReplacer
description: An EXILED plugin for SCP: Secret Laboratory servers that allows players to volunteer to replace SCPs that quit at the beginning of a round

title: MapEditorReborn
description: A map editor plugin for SCP: Secret Laboratory

title: UncomplicatedCustomRoles
description: UncomplicatedCustomRoles is a plugin and an API for EXILED who adds custom roles in the game in a better and more easy way.

title: SCPDiscord
description: A LabAPI plugin which adds remote interaction to an SCP:SL server through Discord.

title: UsefulHints
description: An Exiled & LabAPI (SCP:SL) Plugin that display extra hint like a timers and notifications

title: WelcomeMessage
description: Sends a customizable join message to the joining user (works with the NwPluginAPI).

title: -SCPSL-DoorRestartSystem
description: A plugin for SCP:SL Exiled (ExMod by ExTeam) that simulates a facility-wide door system restart, temporarily locking all doors before restoring access.

title: ElevatorBC
description: Simple SCPSL Exiled plugin that show the name of the player who interacts with elevators or 914 knob

title: Buddy
description: A plugin to let you play on the same team as your friends

title: ScpProximityChat
description: Plugin that allows SCPs to talk with a proximity chat.

title: ItemUtils
description: Exiled plugin allowing for extensive configuration of most base-game items
